extendedInfo.description: Armour yourself with range of Synonyms we are providing through this wonderful app. These set of Synonyms are presented to you with easy to use interface. We provide unique interface for quick selection of words and synonyms (A-Z). Bookmark you favorite words with synonyms for future reference.â â â We have provided 2000+ unique words and sentences to enrich your knowledge. â â ââ Review (Read)Go through the Read section of the app and master the art of synonyms. This section would help you prepare for Match and Spellings sections of the app.â MatchYou will be presented with 4 words at a time on a single slide to match with right synonyms. You can simply swipe thru the complete list. You will be analyzed based on speed and accuracy at which you finish this section.â SpellingsOnce you feel you are ready to spell each word that is part of the list, go and challenge yourself. Your performance in this section is also analyzed.â AnalysisOne of a kind comprehensive analysis of your app usage is provided in this section. Through graph you can appreciate your progress and learning curve.â Store â In-App PurchaseApp provides you sample list of words. To get more you can select the list you want to purchase and enjoy the one of the most complete list of words with matching synonyms.â SettingsYou can set you email ID and password to receive your progress at a regular interval. This would help you track your English language skill development

reviews.title: Awesome App For Learning English Words & Synonyms
reviews.comment: Improve English With Synonyms is a great app to learn thousands of English words and their Synonyms.   The App also gives example sentences to get a better understanding of the words and synonyms.  Thank you for developing this simple yet exciting App.   AWESOME!!!!!
reviews.author: Parth Dalal

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work well
reviews.comment: On my phone.. Sign up in landscape without seeing the questions.. Need a fix.
reviews.author: Rafael Freitas
